Oops! The Reallocation Amount of {!var_Reallocation_Amount} exceeds the Revenue on the Schedule you are reallocating from, {!var_Starting_Schedule.Revenue}, or the Total Price of the Opportunity Product, {!var_Reallocate_from_Opp_Product.TotalPrice}.


Please double check the amount and submit a new Reallocation.
